An exhortation to the inhabitants of Down and Connor concerning religious education of their children in general, and particularly in order to their being confirmed / by Samuel, Lord Bishop of Down and Connor. Foley, Samuel, 1655-1695.
[4], 52 p.
Printed by Joseph Ray ..., Dublin : 1695.
"Imprimatur, March 9. 1694/5, Narcissus Dublin." Errata: verso of t.p. Imperfect: print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
